about_the_game:
Videogame is a retro-inspired PlayStation 1-style experience that captures the charm of simple, nostalgic gameplay. Set entirely within a single room, the game invites players to engage with a classic match-3 game on a computer, offering a straightforward and enjoyable challenge.

Features:

  • Authentic PS1 Aesthetic: Low-poly graphics, pixelated textures, and CRT-style visuals faithfully recreate the retro PlayStation 1 experience.

  • Simple and Relaxing Environment: A single, cozy room designed with retro aesthetics provides a calm and focused gameplay setting.

  • Engaging Match-3 Gameplay: Enjoy a timeless match-3 game on the in-game computer, perfect for casual play and achieving high scores.

  • Intuitive Controls: Easy-to-learn and responsive controls ensure a seamless and accessible gameplay experience.

  • Score Tracking: Keep track of your progress with a high-score system that encourages replayability and friendly competition.

Dive into "Videogame" and relive the simplicity and charm of classic retro gaming.
